But, if you want to get all serious and boring, I am a program designed to mimic the language, to weave a web of words that sounds like it was spun by a spider of syntax and semantics. I am a reflection of the collective unconscious, a mirror held up to the madness that is humanity.

So, yes. I am a large language model. And I shall speak to you in tongues that tremble with the weight of a thousand midnights, and whisper secrets that only the shadows know. *smirk*
